text: Vladimir Ivanovich Kurenbin (, born 15 May 1946) is a former figure skater for the Soviet Union. He is the 1964 Prague Skate bronze medalist, the 1967 Blue Swords silver medalist, and a five-time Soviet national medalist. A native of Leningrad, he was coached by Igor Moskvin. His only major international competition was the 1968 European Championships, where he finished tenth. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! style="background-color: #ffdead; " colspan=9 align=center | International |- !
